title: Details at Eleven
description: Rick and A.J. are hired to find a young woman who flees to Mexico after she discovers her step father, a popular television news anchor, is complicit in a scheme to bribe local government officials.

title: Love, Christy
description: Rick and AJ help a college coed who's car was stolen.

title: Trapdoors
description: When someone steals some money from a bank using a computer. Rick and A.J. are hired to find out who did it. They learn it's a young computer expert. When the man who hired them is shown how it was done, he grabs the boy to get him to steal more.

title: A Recipe for Disaster
description: While trying to locate a spirited young girl caught up in a divorce dispute, Rick and A.J. travel to the oil fields of Mexico where they find the girl's father in deadly conflict with men who will stop at nothing to strike it rich.

title: The Least Dangerous Game
description: When the zoo calls on the Simon brothers to investigate the mysterious death of an animal feeder, Rick and A.J. suspect the official who hired them has something to hide.

title: The Dead Letter File
description: Janet finds a letter in Rick and A.J's office that says that a noted businessman committed a murder years ago and the location of the evidence that implicates the man. Only problem the location is not specific. They start by approaching the man who gets spooked and wonders who could have talk but everyone who knows anything is dead. That is until he remembers that one of them has a daughter. So he tries to take her out and she turns to Rick and A.J. who approached her earlier, for help. And they continue to try and find the location of the evidence.

title: The Hottest Ticket in Town
description: Rick and A.J.'s cousin who's trying to get tickets to a rock concert but it's sold out so she asks their mother to ask them to see if they can get. They ask around and unwittingly stumble across a scheme to sell tickets to seats that don't exist. And the man behind the scheme tries what he can to make sure no one finds out about it.

title: Ashes to Ashes, and None Too Soon
description: When a businessman falls to his death after being served papers by Rick and A.J., his estranged widow informs the brothers they served the wrong man.

title: The Uncivil Servant
description: When Janet discovers that one of their agency's confidential files was taken, he asks A.J. and Rick to help. They discover that it's one of Fowler's trusted employees but when he refuses to tell them why he did it. They set out to find out what's going on. And when Fowler informs the man whose file was taken, he asks Fowler to let it go. And they discover that the person behind it is a member of the IRS.

title: Earth to Stacey
description: Rick needs a client so that he can get back his truck which was repossessed. So he gets one of Fowler's a rich girl who drives them especially A.J. crazy.

title: Double Entry
description: Rick and A.J. are handed yet another 'suspicious husband' case and uncover a bank fraud of the husband's partners. Suddenly the husband is kidnapped by environmental activists and the brothers are pitched into a burning dilemma.

title: Matchmaker
description: A.J. goes under cover as an available art collector so he and brother Rick can determine who is using an upscale computer dating service to attract and rob other wealthy members.

title: Tanks for the Memories
description: When the Simon brother's high school teacher asks them to find a classmate for an upcoming class reunion, the trail leads to a remote outpost of survivalists run by a psychopath.

title: Emeralds Are Not a Girl's Best Friend
description: This is the continuation of the Magnum P.I. episode Ki'is don't lie wherein A.J. and Rick arrive in Los Angeles with HIggins and were hoping to pick up Catherine who stole more than $100,000 from a charity that Robin Masters sponsored. But they discover that the woman in custody was not her. They learn that she went to a country in South America with no extradition treaty with the U.S. So A.J., Rick and Higgins go there to try and get her. Only Rick is familiar with the country and knows it's not going to be easy. they run into an old friend of his and decide to come up with a scam to get to her.

title: Mike & Pat
description: The Simon Brothers are hired to find a dolphin abducted from 'Sea World' and must go through the Navy to track down the men responsible.

title: Guessing Game
description: A psychic hires Rick and A.J. to help her capture a serial killer.

title: Art for Arthur's Sake
description: While investigating the theft of a priceless painting, Rick and A.J. team up with the deceased owner's daughters who are complete opposites as well.

title: The Ten Thousand Dollar Deductible
description: A.J. is transporting $450,000 worth of diamonds by plane for the newly opened Simon & Simon Courier Service when the plane is hijacked and the diamonds are stolen. The Simons become #1 on the FBI's suspect list and to make matters worse there is a ten thousand dollar deductible on their insurance which must be paid before they are paid. The Simons begin tracking down the stolen diamonds while evading FBI agents tailing them. They suspect it might have been an inside job and their investigation leads them back to the airport and Bailey Randall whose company was in charge of the security for the flight.

title: Rough Rider Rides Again
description: An actor who played the character on a long running TV show has fallen on hard times and his only means of support is making appearances as his old character. But when a producer gets the rights to his character and is about to make a new movie with a different actor in the role, he bars the actor from appearing as his old character. When the actor goes to see the producer to be paid, the producer is killed. So A.J. and Rick are hired to help the man.

roles.char: Barney - seller of maps to stars' home

title: Sometimes Dreams Come True
description: A woman who has recurring nightmares that her twin sister is in grave danger hires the Simon brothers to find her when she turns up missing.

title: The Last Time I Saw Michael
description: Margaret who along with her husband were good friends of Cecilia and her family, says that she got a phone call from her husband who went missing four years ago. Cecilia asks Rick and A.J. who thought of her husband as second father, to make sure that someone is not trying to take advantage of her. She later gets a letter which she says is written in her husband's handwriting, asking her for money. They have the note analyzed and the handwriting expert can't be certain is the handwriting is of Margaret's husband. When Margaret wants to give the money, the boys asks her to wait.

title: Fowl Play
description: A staff member of a pro football club asks the Simon Brothers to discreetly investigate who is threatening the life of his friend who plays for the team.

title: Thin Air
description: Rick's ex is accused of killing her husband. She denies it. Rick tries to help her. But they discover circumstantial evidence that makes her seem guilty. They then decide to talk to her daughter and she gives them some info that may help her mother.

title: Murder Between the Lines
description: A pulp fiction writer pays Rick and A.J. a handsome fee to find a crazed killer who uses the author's latest novel as a blueprint for murder.

title: Psyched Out
description: Rick and A.J. go back to college when a heartbroken student hires Simon & Simon to investigate her brother's mysterious death on campus. A.J. joins the track team and Rick signs on as a guinea pig for strange psychological experiments.

title: Pirate's Key: Part 1
description: After Rick and A.J. 'borrow' and trash a powerful Senator's car, he arranges a hearing to revoke their P.I. license over charges of unethical conduct when the brother's lived in Florida.

title: Pirate's Key: Part 2
description: After Rick and A.J. 'borrow' and trash a powerful Senator's car, he arranges a hearing to revoke their P.I. license over charges of unethical conduct when the brother's lived in Florida.

title: The Club Murder Vacation
description: When Rick and A.J. begin piecing together the details of a murder A.J. believes he witnessed while on vacation with Cecilia, the local sheriff threatens retribution if the brothers don't stop 'snooping around.'

title: The Secret of the Chrome Eagle
The Skeleton Who Came Out of the Closet
Caught Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
Too Much of a Good Thing

roles.char: The King in the play MacBeth

title: Bloodlines
description: The brothers investigate the disappearance of a mare from a horse farm.

title: Heels and Toes
description: Rick and AJ help a woman who wants to leave behind the world of erotic dancing and enter the more exclusive world of ballet.

roles.char: Air Force Col. Christopher J. Ahern
Dr. Lloyd Tyler - Chief of Surgery

title: The Disappearance of Harry the Hat
C'est Simon: Part 1
description: The brothers with the help of Downtown Brown pose as international arms dealers to rescue their Mother and her Fiance from terrorists abductors.

title: C'est Simon: Part 2
description: The brothers with the help of Downtown Brown pose as international arms dealers to rescue their Mother and her Fiance from terrorists abductors.

title: The Dark Side of the Street
Who Killed the Sixties?
description: Aj helps an old girlfriend look for the killer of her brother after 20 years.

title: Almost Completely Out of Circulation
description: When the creator of a popular comic book is killed, his grandson goes to A.J. and Rick claiming that he knows who killed his grandfather -it was the arch enemy of the hero of the comic. They eventually learn that every character in the comic is inspired by a real person. So they have to figure out who was the inspiration for the villain.

title: Yes, Virginia, There Is a Liberace
Simon Without Simon: Part 1
description: The brothers after becoming locally famous split up and find themselves having to reunite to save themselves from Jail.

title: Simon Without Simon: Part 2
description: The brothers after becoming locally famous split up and find themselves having to reunite to save themselves from Jail.

roles.char: Old Woman at Hot Dog Stand

title: Love and/or Marriage
description: A woman who knows Cecilia hires the guys to find if her husband is having an affair. While working the case Rick finds himself attracted to the woman. They eventually learn what's going on with her husband and try to help him.

title: Have You Hugged Your Private Detective Today?
Walk a Mile in My Hat

roles.char: Police Capt. J. C. Hacker - homicide

title: Family Forecast
description: A game show host suspects that the show he is currently hosting is fixed. So he turns to the Simons for help because he was already involved in the game show fixing scandal in the 50's even though he was completely innocent. So they try to find out how they're doing it.

title: For the People
description: A.J. and Rick were at a restaurant when the owner is killed. And while they didn't actually see the incident, they saw a man standing over him with the weapon. The prosecutor whom they know, who is using the case for exposure, is determined to see the man convicted. But they eventually realize the man may be innocent and the prosecutor also knows it but is apparently using them to get someone else.

title: Full Moon Blues
description: The brothers have trouble with both the Fed's and the Mob while looking for a eccentric woman's ex-boyfriend all while Rick makes an important life decision.

title: D-I-V-O-R-C-E
description: The brothers get in the middle of a divorce involving two of their Mom's best friends.

title: Act Five
description: When a man who's going through a messy divorce hires Rick and A.J. to locate a man who could give vital testimony, they find him bring him to court, he testifies and his wife's alimony suit is dismissed. Later they learn that their client and the man they were hired to find were in cahoots so that he wouldn't have to pay his wife a divorce settlement. When they are unable to prove their client's collusion and Brown tells them to let it go. They decide to turn Brown's cousin Lucky a con man who's just been released from prison. Brown warns them that Lucky is not to be trusted and after they approach him, he is approached by some people whom he owes money to and offers them what he's going to get from Rick and A.J.'s plot.

title: The Apple Doesn't Fall Far from the Tree
A.W.O.L.
description: A sailor who's accused of a crime he didn't commit, borrows money from Cecilia to send to his family. But when he goes on the run Rick and A.J. track him down along with a Naval officer tasked with bringing him back. But someone is also trying to kill the sailor.

title: Still Phil After All These Years
description: It's Cecilia's 40th high school reunion. She asks the boys to dig up a time capsule she and her classmates placed things in and buried. She then asks them to locate one of her classmates a guy named Phil whom she dated before she dated the boys father. A.J. is uncomfortable about it. When they open it, they find a policeman's badge from Mexico and a gun which is used by Mexican police and that it was fired. The boys take it to Town. Later Phil shows up and says that 40 years ago he went to Mexico and got into it with a local cop and shot him with his gun and ran with the gun and his badge and placed it in the time capsule. The boys turn him to the police but Cecilia doesn't believe him and she asks the boys to look into it but A.J. is not exactly willing.

title: The Cop Who Came to Dinner
The Rookie
description: A female rookie cop thinks her training officer might be crooked. So she hires Rick and A.J. to help her prove it. But somehow the investigation blows back on her and she's suspended.

title: I Thought the War Was Over
Lost Lady
description: A.J,'s former girlfriend, Janet Fowler who works for the Attorney General, is found after someone tries to kill her. She has a designer drug in her possession and she has amnesia. A.J. and Rick try to find out what happened to her. A.J. also takes the opportunity to reconnect with her.

title: Desperately Seeking Dacody
description: A reporter, whom Rick knew in Vietnam and is not too fond of, manipulates him to help her on a story about a wrongfully accused man.

title: You, Too, Can Be a Detective
Forever Hold Your Piece
description: Rick takes the case of a buddy who's going through a divorce, and the boys but heads with another agency who's working for the man's estranged wife.

title: Bad Betty
description: Rick and AJ join forces with a tough female bounty hunter to bring down some nefarious beings.

title: Baja, Humbug
description: After Rick inherits a fishing boat from a friend, he and AJ move to Mexico to start a charter business. They promptly run afoul of some local thugs.

title: A Firm Grasp of Reality
description: Rick poses as a patient in a mental hospital in order to protect a brilliant scientist with multiple personalities.

title: Ties That Bind
description: The detectives help out a cop friend who's brother is in hock to the mob.

title: Little Boy Dead
description: Racial tensions boil over as Abigale struggles with shooting a young black boy while in pursuit of some criminals.

title: Sudden Storm
description: Rick and AJ must set aside their rage and replace it with professionalism as they attempt to capture their mother's rapist.

title: Something Special
description: The agency takes on the case of an architect who's being muscled by an unknown saboteur.

title: May the Road Rise Up
description: After seeing their father's old car - long thought to be destroyed in the accident that took his life - the brothers dig into the details crash and bring up some sad memories, as well as a possible cover-up.

title: Beauty and Deceased
description: AJ goes undercover as a contestant in a model search with the hopes of flushing out a blackmailer.

title: Simon & Simon and Associates
description: After a high profile capture, the boys incorporate the business to deal with the influx of work their popularity brings.

title: Zen and the Art of the Split-Finger Fastball
description: Rick and AJ protect a wealthy client at a baseball fantasy camp.

title: The Merry Adventures of Robert Hood
description: The brothers work with a do-gooder who, you guessed it, steals from the rich to give to the poor.

title: Ain't Gonna Get It from Me, Jack
description: Jerry Orbach gives a classic performance as a talk-show host closely modeled on Morton Downey Jr. -- a highly conservative, highly combative man who whips his audiences into frenzies (all pre-staged to attract viewers). The host actually has a smart, brave side which he tries hard to conceal -- but he saves Cecelia's life when both of them are menaced by a stalker. When a fight breaks out in the studio during a taping (exactly mirroring a fight on Geraldo Rivera's talk show the very day before this episode was broadcast) someone in the overhead lighting grid takes advantage to start blasting away at the host with a huge revolver. A.J. and Rick identify the stalker and start hunting for him as he goes over the wall into an adjacent empty studio, but can they stop him before he kills the talk show host, who also went next door?

title: Love Song of Abigail Marsh
description: The boys' police lieutenant friend falls for their client, a man with a secret.

title: Simon & Simon Jr.
description: A cocky teen delivers a letter to Rick stating that he is the boy's father. Taken with the lad, Rick helps save him from a Los Angeles thug.

title: Cloak of Danger
description: AJ writes a play about a cold case that the Simons couldn't crack, but when an actor gets murdered, they reopen the investigation.

title: The Richer They Are the Harder They Fall
description: When AJ's wealthy college roommate drops dead of a heart attack during his anniversary party, the boys know something's amiss.

title: Play It Again, Simon
description: AJ finds himself in 1940's Los Angeles.

title: First, Let's Kill All the Lawyers
description: When the boys are hired to find out who is leaking confidential information and using it for insider trading. The trail leads them to their client's son. But before he could be confronted, he is killed. The suspect is the boy's friend and he is arrested. But at his hearing his lawyer, who is Cecilia's latest beau uses personal info on Rick to discredit him thus releasing the man. Rick and A.J. try to find another way to get him.

title: Photo Finished
description: Against their better judgment, and policy, Rick and AJ take on the case of a political candidate who thinks his wife is having an affair. As they proceed with the case, the Simons uncover a conspiracy.
